item.title: Getting started with ldap
item.description: Setting up PHP to work with LDAP # After you configured your LDAP server correctly, now we want to connect. For example by using PHP. DN = distinguished name. This means, in which part of the database are you working. Can be a user or a group (or even config settings). Entry: an entity, for example a user. Attribute: something inside an entry, for example name, phone number and email address.
